paragraphs.text:
%pyspark
import nltk
from collections import Counter
# counters = tokensDF.rdd.map(lambda x: nltk.pos_tag(x.tokens)).map(lambda x: Counter(x)).collect()
counters = tokensDF.rdd.map(lambda x: Counter(x.tokens)).collect()
counter = Counter()
for c in counters:
    counter.update(c)
common = counter.most_common(100)
for c in common:
    print(c)
